TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: The class represents a set of site links that communicate through a transport.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType> type is RPC.

Docs.exception: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.

This exception will occur for any of the following reasons:
- The parameter does not refer to a valid forest, configuration set, domain controller, or AD LDS server.
- The parameter is an empty string.
The parameter or the parameter is .
The credentials that were supplied are not valid.
